thread.title: Juventus to rival Arsenal and Manchester City for Monaco wonderkid Kylian Mbappe after dazzling display against Manchester City
thread.title_full: Juventus to rival Arsenal and Manchester City for Monaco wonderkid Kylian Mbappe after dazzling display against Manchester City

author: leeastley
title: Juventus to rival Arsenal and Manchester City for Monaco wonderkid Kylian Mbappe after dazzling display against Manchester City
text:
EFL Mbappe battle Juventus to rival Arsenal and Manchester City for Monaco wonderkid Kylian Mbappe after dazzling display against Manchester City 
The 18-year-old Frenchman's brilliant performance in the 5-3 thriller against Manchester United has got Juve interested Gossip Comments ARSENAL and Manchester City face competition from Italian giants Juventus for Monaco wonderkid Kylian Mbappe. 
French attacker Mbappe has caught the attention of clubs after his brilliant performance against Manchester City in the Champions League. Getty Images Kylian Mbappe is wanted by Juventus, Manchester City and Arsenal Leonardo Jardim admits interest in Premier League amid Arsenal links 
Mbappe , 18, scored one in the 5-3 thriller at the Etihad and, according to Bleacher Report , Juve are interested in him. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Arsenal and Manchester City news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
He has since excelled under boss Leonardo Jardim and become Europe's hottest prospect. Getty Images 4 Kylian Mbappe scored in Monaco's thrilling 5-3 loss against Manchester City 
City were reported to be willing to pay £40million for Mbappe last summer but due to his excellent from that price could rise further. 
Mbappe - who had trials at Chelsea when he was 11-years-old - could now cost £50m with another £30m in add-ons. 
Any deal would be similar to that of Anthony Martial when he joined Manchester United for an initial fee of £36m. 
Mbappe also spent the week at Real Madrid in December 2014 before playing for his local club AS Bondy. related stories kyl any hope Arsenal transfer blow as Monaco star Kylian Mbappe had posters of Real Madrid on his bedroom wall In for the Kyl Everything you need to know about Monaco's Kylian Mbappe... who is dubbed the 'next Thierry Henry' going in for the kyl Tottenham to rival Arsenal for 'new Thierry Henry' Kylian Mbappe after Monaco teenager nets hat-trick Va Va Voom 'New Thierry Henry' Kylian Mbappe nets hat-trick as Monaco retain top spot with crushing 5-0 win over Metz Knocked mbappe Arsene Wenger compares Kylian Mbappe to Thierry Henry... but admits he snubbed Arsenal last summer Reuters Kylian Mbappe has been compared to Monaco and Arsenal legend Thierry Henry Getty Images 4 Kylian Mbappe could cost up to £50million after his brilliant run of form for Monaco 
He has now gone on to break Henry's records at Monaco to be their youngest ever debutante and youngest ever goalscorer. 
And Gunners boss Arsene Wenger heaped praise on the France U19 international. 
Wenger said: "Mbappe has similarities to Thierry Henry. He has a huge talent."
